mapper.insert: insert into article(slug, title, description, body, user_id) values (#{slug}, #{title}, #{description}, #{body}, #{userId})
mapper.update: update article set slug = #{slug}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, body = #{body}, updated_at = current_timestamp where article_id = #{id}
mapper.sql: select article_id as id, slug, title, description, body, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, user_id as userId from article
mapper.select: select max(article_id) as max_id from article
